thumb.name: Return Address 1/2 x 1 3/4
thumb.verse: %3CB%3ELabels%3C/B%3E are an easy way to express your personality. Create %26 Print offers several kinds of commonly-used labels from address and return address labels to CD-disk labels.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EDirections:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E1. Click on %3CB%3EPersonalise and Print Your Project%3C/B%3E to open the Create %26 Print workspace. %3CBR%3E2. Personalise the text. Select the text to write over it or change size, colour and font style.%3CBR%3E3. Print your project.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3ETips:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3EPrint your labels on scrap paper first to check the alignment, spelling and overall look of the project. %3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E
